browseToolsDesc: Explore all available tools and equipment for rent on the platform.
pendingProductsNotice: Your products are pending approval. You can view them in your profile.
pendingProductsDescription: Once approved, they will be visible to all users.
idRequirement1: Must be a valid government-issued ID
idRequirement2: Must clearly show your name and photo
idRequirement3: Must be in color and high resolution
idRequirement5: Must have a clear picture of your face
name: Name
dateUnavailable: This date is unavailable for rent.
endDateBeforePendingStart: End date cannot be before the start date.
endDateAfterStart: End date cannot be after the start date.
dateOverlapsPendingBooking: Selected dates overlap with a pending booking. Please select different dates.
noProductsAvailable: No products available in this category.
toolNotAvailable: This tool is not available for rent at the moment.
testingEnvironmentDesc: This is a testing environment. All transactions are simulated and will not affect real accounts.
withdrawableAmountDesc: This is the amount you can withdraw to your bank account.
idVerificationDesc: Verify your identity to increase trust and security on the platform.
findEverything: Find everything from cameras to cleaning tools — all in one place.
competitivePricing: We offer competitive pricing for all rental items.
userFriendly: Our platform is user-friendly and easy to navigate.
safeTransactions: We ensure safe and secure transactions for all users.
missionDescription: To make everyday tools and equipment accessible and affordable for everyone, empowering smarter living through simple and secure rentals.
visionDescription: To become the leading rental platform in the region, transforming how people access items they need — without the need to own them.
coreValuesDescription: We value trust, simplicity, and affordability — making rentals easy, safe, and sustainable through a connected community.
viewAllProducts: View all uploaded products with details
aboutUsHeroSubtitle: Making tools accessible, affordable, and shared.
whoWeAreDescription: We're a team of passionate problem-solvers who believe that access to the right tools should be simple, affordable, and community-driven. Our platform connects people who need equipment with those who have it making it easy to rent anything from a power drill to a ladder, for a few hours or a few days. Whether you're working on a home project, a business task, or something creative, we're here to help you find exactly what you need without the hassle of buying. At our core, we believe in sharing resources, building trust, and helping you get the job done smarter not harder.
fromDrillsToDrones: From drills to drones, we have everything you need for your next project.
varietyOfToolsDescription: From drills and ladders to projectors and drones. Rento gives you access to a growing library of tools and equipment for any task, big or small.
secureTransactionsDescription: All users are verified, and every rental is protected. Our system ensures your payments and tools are handled with trust and transparency.
flexibleOptionsDescription: Choose the handover method that works best for you pickup, doorstep delivery, or in-person meetups. Convenience is at your fingertips.
ecoConsciousDescription: Renting means less waste and more sharing. Together, we reduce unnecessary purchases and promote sustainable living for a better tomorrow.
joinUsDescription: Create an account now it's free! and rent the tool you want!
contactInfoSent: Contact information has been sent to your email
contactDetailsAvailable: Contact details are now available in your rentals
noContactDetailsDesc: You don't have any active rentals with contact details yet. Contact details will be available after booking confirmation.
completionConfirmedMessage: Rental completion has been confirmed. The product will be available for rent again.
completionConfirmationError: Failed to confirm completion. Please try again.
noRentedProducts: No products are currently being rented.
shareBannerDescription: Do you have tools, cameras, or equipment you don't use daily? Don't let them collect dust — turn them into extra income with Rento. Our platform makes it easy to share what you own with those who need it, whether for a day, weekend, or longer period.
overviewSubtitle: The leading platform for sharing tools and equipment
overviewDescription1: Rento is a revolutionary peer-to-peer rental platform that connects people who own tools and equipment with those who need them. Whether you're a DIY enthusiast, a professional contractor, or someone who just needs a specific tool for a project, Rento makes it easy to find what you need and rent it.
overviewDescription2: Our platform is built on principles of community, sustainability, and economic efficiency. By sharing resources, we reduce waste, save money, and build stronger communities. Every rental helps the owner earn extra income and the renter access tools they might not be able to afford.
overviewDescription3: With advanced security features, comprehensive insurance options, and an easy-to-use interface, Rento ensures that every rental experience is safe, convenient, and rewarding for all parties involved.
feature1: Secure payment processing with warranty protection
feature4: Verified user profiles and rating system
step1Description: Browse our extensive catalog of tools and equipment. Use filters to find exactly what you need, when you need it.
step2Description: Choose rental dates, review terms, and complete your booking with our secure payment system.
step3Description: Meet the owner, get your rental, and enjoy using high-quality tools for your project.
ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who are saving money and earning extra income through Rento.
pricingSubtitle: No hidden fees. Clear commission structure that works for everyone.
commissionDescription: We take a small 10% commission from each successful rental to cover platform costs, security, and support services.
renterBenefit1: No additional fees beyond rental price
renterBenefit3: Access to high-quality tools at affordable prices
ownerBenefit2: No listing fees or monthly subscriptions
cameraDescription: Professional DSLR camera for photography projects
toolDescription: Heavy-duty drill for home improvement projects
campingDescription: Complete camping gear for outdoor adventures
pricingCTA: Join our community of successful product owners and start earning extra income from your unused tools and equipment.
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to share tools seamlessly
securePaymentsDesc: Bank-level encryption and secure payment processing with warranty protection for all transactions.
verifiedUsersDesc: All users undergo identity verification to ensure trust and safety in every transaction.
realTimeChatDesc: Instant messaging system for seamless communication between renters and product owners.
flexibleSchedulingDesc: Easy booking system with customizable rental periods and availability management.
reviewSystemDesc: Comprehensive rating and review system to help users make informed decisions.
mobileAppDesc: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes.
smartMatchingDesc: Our AI-powered system matches you with the perfect tools and trusted owners based on your needs and location.
aiPoweredDesc: Advanced algorithms that continuously improve your rental experience.
dataProtectionDesc: Your personal information is protected with industry-standard encryption and privacy procedures.
fraudProtectionDesc: Advanced fraud detection systems and secure payment processing to protect all users.
customerSupportDesc: 24/7 customer support team ready to help with any questions or issues.
firebaseBackendDesc: Scalable cloud infrastructure and real-time database
firebaseAIDesc: AI-powered chatbot for instant customer support
featuresCTA: Join thousands of users who trust Rento for their tool sharing needs.
termsSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.
faq1Answer: The commission is calculated as 10% of the total rental amount (excluding taxes and insurance). For example, if you rent a product for $50 per day for 3 days, total $150, the commission would be $15.
faq2Question: When do I receive my earnings?
faq2Answer: Earnings are typically released to your account within 24-48 hours after the rental period ends, provided there are no disputes or reported issues.
faq3Answer: No hidden fees! The 10% commission is clearly displayed before every transaction, and there are no additional fees for listing products or using the platform.
helpSubtitle: Get the help you need to make the most of Rento
searchHelpDesc: Find answers to common questions and browse our comprehensive help articles
liveChatDesc: Get instant help from our AI-powered chatbot
emailSupportDesc: Send us a detailed message and we'll respond within 24 hours
faq4Question: How do I rent a product?
faq4Answer: Browse products, choose your dates, review terms, and complete your booking with secure payment.
faq5Question: What if the product is damaged?
faq5Answer: Contact us immediately. We have insurance coverage and will help resolve any issues.
faq6Answer: Yes, you can cancel up to 24 hours before the rental start time for a full refund.
faq7Question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq7Answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets through our secure payment system.
faq8Answer: Payment is processed when you complete your booking. The owner receives payment after the rental period.
faq9Answer: Yes, we use bank-level encryption and secure payment processing to protect your information.
emergencySupport: For urgent issues outside business hours, please use our live chat or email support.
resourcesDesc: Explore our comprehensive guides and resources to get the most out of Rento
userGuideDesc: Complete guide to using Rento's features and services
featuresGuideDesc: Learn about all the powerful features available on our platform
pricingGuideDesc: Understand our transparent pricing structure and commission rates
termsIntroText1: Welcome to Rento. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform and services.
termsIntroText2: By accessing or using Rento, you agree to be bound by these terms and all applicable laws and regulations.
termsIntroText3: If you do not agree to any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this service.
serviceDefinitionText: Rento's peer-to-peer rental platform and all related services.
userDefinitionText: Any individual or entity that accesses or uses our platform.
contentDefinitionText: All information, data, text, images, and other materials posted on our platform.
rentalDefinitionText: The temporary use of tools or equipment through our platform.
acceptanceText1: By using our platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
acceptanceText2: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Rento.
acceptanceText3: If you are using our services on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have authority to bind that organization.
accountCreationText1: To use our platform, you must create an account with valid information.
accountCreationText2: You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy of your account information.
accountCreationText3: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account.
accountSecurityText1: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
accountSecurityText2: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
accountSecurityText3: We are not liable for any losses resulting from unauthorized account access.
accountTerminationText1: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate our terms.
accountTerminationText2: You may terminate your account at any time through your account settings.
accountTerminationText3: Termination does not relieve you of obligations incurred before termination.
permittedUse1: Using the platform for legitimate rental transactions
permittedUse3: Respecting other users' rights and property
permittedUse4: Complying with all applicable laws and regulations
prohibitedUse1: Violating any applicable laws or regulations
prohibitedUse2: Posting false, misleading, or fraudulent information
prohibitedUse3: Harassing, threatening, or harming other users
prohibitedUse4: Attempting to circumvent our security measures
prohibitedUse5: Using the platform for illegal or unauthorized purposes
listingItemsText1: You may list items that you own and have the right to rent.
listingItemsText2: All items must be accurately described with clear photos.
listingItemsText3: You are responsible for the condition and safety of your items.
rentalProcessText1: Rentals are confirmed when payment is processed.
rentalProcessText2: You must provide items in the condition described.
rentalProcessText3: Both parties must follow the agreed rental terms.
paymentTermsText1: All payments are processed through our secure system.
paymentTermsText2: We deduct our commission before releasing funds to owners.
paymentTermsText3: Refunds are processed according to our refund policy.
privacyText1: We collect and process your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
privacyText2: Your personal information is protected with industry-standard security measures.
privacyText3: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties without consent.
platformIPText: All content and technology on our platform is owned by Rento or licensed to us.
userContentText: You retain ownership of content you post, but grant us license to use it.
licenseText: We grant you a limited license to use our platform for its intended purpose.
serviceDisclaimerText: Our platform is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind.
liabilityDisclaimerText: We are not liable for damages arising from use of our platform.
warrantyDisclaimerText: We do not warrant that our service will be uninterrupted or error-free.
liabilityText1: Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for our services.
liabilityText2: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
liabilityText3: These limitations apply to the maximum extent permitted by law.
indemnificationText1: You agree to indemnify us against claims arising from your use of our platform.
indemnificationText2: This includes claims related to your content or rental activities.
indemnificationText3: We will notify you of any claims and cooperate in your defense.
governingLawText1: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where Rento operates.
governingLawText2: Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of that jurisdiction.
governingLawText3: If any provision is unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain in effect.
changesText1: We may update these terms from time to time.
changesText2: We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification.
changesText3: Continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
contactText1: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us.

confirmRemoveAdmin: Are you sure you want to remove admin privileges from this user?
confirmAddAdmin: Are you sure you want to add admin privileges to this user?
adminRoleDescription: Super admins have full access to all features including admin management. Regular admins have limited access.

loginRequiredMessage: Please log in to make a booking.

missingInformationMessage: Please fill in all personal information fields.
missingPaymentDetailsMessage: Please fill in all credit card details.
missingPhoneNumberMessage: Please enter your phone number for mobile payment.

otpResentMessage: A new OTP code has been sent to {0}.
userNotFoundMessage: Unable to find your user profile. Please contact support.
bookingConfirmedMessage: Your rental has been successfully confirmed. You will receive a confirmation email soon.
locationClearedMessage: The location has been cleared. You can now select a location manually on the map or search for an address.
locationAccuracyHelpMessage: If your location is not accurate, here are some solutions:
manualLocationSelectionMessage: Click anywhere on the map to precisely select your location.
searchForAddressMessage: Use the search bar above to find your exact address.
improveGPSAccuracyMessages: Go outside or near a window
Wait 10 to 30 seconds for GPS to stabilize
Enable high-accuracy mode on your device
Try on a mobile device (better GPS)
browserIssuesMessages: Check location settings in the browser
locationAccuracyFinalNote: The most reliable method is to manually click on the map or search for your address.
subscriptionDescription: Unlock premium features and maximize your rental experience with our flexible subscription plans
